resources.string: Are you sure you want to send # recordings?
Please make sure Personal name,AuthorID,Password and EmailID are correct
Please enter an e-mail address for your Account.This email address can also be used for the first Author using the Dictation App.
Please set an ID for the Author. Dictation files will be tagged with the Author ID. The ID must be between 1 and 16 letters, numbers or underbars.
Please create your Account ID. The ID must be less than 256 letters.
Please set a password for your Account. The password must be between 8 and 24 characters, containing at least one letter, one number, and one special character.
[For users that have a existing Company Account]
Please enter the E-mail Address for the Author who will use the Dictation App.

Thank you for sigining up for the Olympus Dictation Delivery Service.
The trial license is valid for xx days.

During the trial,you can add up to 100 Authors to be managed under the Dictation Delivery Service.Authors can be added from the Olympus Dictation Portal.Login from the following URL.

If you wish to continue using the
Olympus Dictation DeliveryService.
please

License can be purchased under the
[Account] Tab.

To purchase the license please enter
the following information.
\u2022 Country where you are based.
\u2022 The dealer you wish to purchase the lisence from.
\u2022 Number of lisences.

Olympus Dictation Portal URL
[-https://www.dictation-portal.com/-]

If you already have a corporate account,please complete your registration from the following. 
 please confirm the following information with your administrator and enter the information in the next screen 
\u Account ID 
\u Password for Dictation Delivery Service 
\u Your email address
Yes, I agree to the Terms of Use
Please enter the E-mail destination for the Dictation files from Author. If you with to add multiple destinations, please setup from Olympus Dictation Portal after you complete the initial setup
Your file had been sent to the Dictation Delivery Server but could not be sent anywhere since the destination has not been set.
This device is already activaed by another e-mail address

Thank you for using the Olympus Dictation App.\nBeginning with Olympus Dictation Version 2.0.0, the ability to send Dictations by E-mail has been migrated to Olympus Dictation Delivery Service (ODDS). Your Dictations will be sent via an external server managed by ODDS.

In order to send Dictation from the App, you are required to sign up for the Olympus Dictation Delivery Service. 

Your dictations will be sent to an external server managed by ODDS.By sigining up, your dictations will be tranferred from the external server to a designated destination. 

 Please sign up to use ODDS as a trial. During the trial period,you can test the full functionality of the service.

 After the trial, you are required to purchase an annual license in order to continue using the ODDS.

 Click the following and sign up for the trial now.
Please select the following if it is your first time to sign up for the Olympus Dictation delivery Service
Invalid argument to activate to available license - Recipients is not set or invalide e-mail format - Author ID is blank or invalide character
Invalid ODP account. This ODP login ID is already registered
Invalid ODP e-mail address. ODP e-mail address for administrator is already registered.
Please enter your company name or your personal name
Please set a password for the Dictation Delivery Service.\nThe password must be more than 8 or less than 25 letters,number and symbols.
Account registration for Dictation Delivery Service
Tap here to read the Terms of Use for ODDS
Tap here to read the Terms of Use for ODDS
